items.sentence: Where is the accent on the word \'Australia?\'
How did you know Tom wasn\'t going to like it?
Tom entered the room and turned on the lights.
Tom finished doing his homework before dinner.
I don\'t know what you want and I don\'t care.
Tom grabbed Mary by the throat and choked her.
I have no idea why Tom wasn\'t here yesterday.
I probably should\'ve asked Tom that question.
I realize that I should\'ve been more careful.
Do you still want us to take care of your dog?
Do you want me to help you with your homework?
Tom didn\'t have to get up as early as he did.
Tom didn\'t have to tell me what had happened.
Don\'t carry too much baggage when you travel.
Don\'t spend so much time watching television.
I heard that Tom wants to swim this afternoon.
I helped Tom decide where to hang the picture.
I hope Tom can fit me into his tight schedule.
I haven\'t been able to get in touch with Tom.
I haven\'t been able to solve the problem yet.
If we work as a team, we can achieve anything.
Tom said he\'s really sorry for what happened.
I spent the whole afternoon cleaning my house.
Tom lifted up his shirt and exposed his belly.
Tom is very close to his girlfriend\'s family.
Tom isn\'t going to take a vacation this year.
Tom isn\'t the kind of guy that would do that.
You took the cookies out of the oven too soon.
You can\'t believe anything Tom says about me.
Tom said you might be interested in this book.
Tom says he has never tried eating whale meat.
I\'ll get a picture of you giving your speech.
I like the mountains more than I like the sea.
I like to give gifts to my family and friends.
I once saw a man walk barefoot over hot coals.
We\'ll be taking down our Christmas tree soon.
I didn\'t recognize him at first on the train.
I didn\'t think Tom would ask Mary to do that.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time in jail.
Tom was wearing the old jacket I\'d given him.
Tom wasn\'t very surprised that that happened.
Tom wants to see a doctor as soon as possible.
Tom was a lot shorter than me in kindergarten.
Tom was afraid of being captured by the enemy.
Many students live in the suburbs of the city.
Do you know the reason why he cut class today?
Do you know the reason why the sky looks blue?
Do you know what time that supermarket closes?
Tom said that he didn\'t know Mary\'s address.
I\'ve never seen a plane fly over this island.
Is it true that you\'re a high school teacher?
Have you ever seen Tom without his glasses on?
Have you ever seen something like this before?
Have you ever stirred your coffee with a fork?
Have you ever tried to learn another language?
Have you ever tried to swim across this river?
I\'m well aware of Tom\'s financial situation.
Tomorrow I\'m going to give Tom my old guitar.
I think we\'re the only people on this island.
Tom didn\'t arrive until the meeting was over.
I\'m sure that Tom doesn\'t want to miss this.
I\'m sure you\'ve seen everything you need to.
I\'m surprised that Tom doesn\'t speak French.
My doctor told me not to drink so much coffee.
I want to live somewhere that isn\'t polluted.
Have you ever eaten chocolate-covered popcorn?
Have you ever lost your luggage at an airport?
You want to go to Boston with Tom, don\'t you?
You\'re not really going to kill Tom, are you?
You\'re old enough to take care of yourselves.
Someone left a burning cigarette on the table.
Something funny happened to me on my way home.
Stop taking pictures. You look like a tourist.
Talk to Tom and see what he thinks about this.
I didn\'t know what we were doing was illegal.
I didn\'t mean to interrupt your conversation.
I didn\'t notice whether Tom was there or not.
Why don\'t you try to behave like a gentleman?
Can you tell me more about the person you saw?
Tom knew that Mary didn\'t want to drink beer.
I want the whole world to know we\'re in love.
I know that most people here can speak French.
Tom tried to squeeze in between Mary and John.
Tom tried to talk Mary into driving all night.
Tom decided to learn to live with the problem.
I\'ll be there the first thing in the morning.
I\'ll do whatever I can to protect all of you.
I wish someone would tell me what\'s going on.
I wish we had the time to help, but we don\'t.
I won\'t allow my daughter to go out with you.
Tom is the only one who knows how to fix this.
Tom is the only one who knows where Mary went.
Tom is the only one who really understands me.
I\'m sure that I\'ll find a good gift for Tom.
Tom\'s mother must\'ve been very disappointed.
Why should Tom do that if he doesn\'t have to?
Wouldn\'t it be nice if Tom did that for Mary?
Have you ever forgotten your wife\'s birthday?
Maybe you shouldn\'t do that with Tom anymore.
It took me ten minutes to walk to the station.
